column5: Rain came through when I got home from work, so I couldn't mow (really bothered by that), so the wife and kids wanted to walk back to the neighbor's pond....  I gave in and grabbed my rod.  Was there for about 15 min, and wife says, "Two more casts".  Last cast, I land this nice fish:   Gotta have 1 more cast after that.  Dang!  Another one spit the hook.  "1 more cast honey....promise".  Here comes this one....bigger than the first!   One more cast....nothing.....bath time for the boys.....  dk
still waiting for some rain to head this way.....
Glad to finally have it FD....I haven't mowed in 5 weeks, and the crops around here are at or past the point of no return.  Just went out and it's raining again!  dk
Great report!  Your kids look very interested in the fish...haha.  Nice to have a private pond like that nearby that you can fish...you are truly fortunate in that!!
I hear ya' CC....it's going to be a great place to practice some techniques for bass to use in the "real world"  lol  dk

Dustin, that's a fabulous picture of your little guy looking at the bass, and you can just imagine the thoughts going thru his young mind !!  That shot is definetely worth framing and hanging on the wall !!
Good stuff Dustin!  I here ya on the mowing, my mower hasn't seen the yard for a month now. We've had a couple days that is has rained in the last week, first since memorial day weekend.  Whopper
that's awesome! very jealous! can't beat time with your kids!  UF

Yep!  Set it as my wallpaper this morning in the office, and told the wife I want a framed 5x7 as well!!!  Now...if I could just get my other son Photoshop'ed out.....anyone want to practice PS, feel free!  dk
Somehow I don't think that statement came out the way you meant it Dustin, but I imagine we all know what you mean
Ya never know Lew "the other" might be in the dog house.  jk I think I knew what he meant  Whopper
Yeah...didn't sound quite right.....please don't call CPS!
